title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Logistics Support Company

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to develop a logistics support company for the countrys forward deployed CT units, the Special Anti-Terrorism Task Group (SATG). This organic sustainment capability will ensure the provision of supplies and maintenance to allow deployment of the SATG into remote parts of Chad. Equipment provided includes vehicles, radios, organizational clothing and personal equipment, weapons and ammunition, and medical equipment.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Air Base Development

description.narrative: To conduct or support programs providing training and equipment to national security forces of foreign countries for the purpose of building capacity of partner nations. The Defense Security Cooperation Agency (DSCA) provides program management. Country teams work through DoD geographic Combatant Commands (COCOMs).

title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Chad - Defense Management Initiative and Logistics #5. Conduct a 2-day logistics planning symposium establishing two joint groups assigned different operational scenarios. Bring together multi-service sustainment and operational leaders to follow a five-step planning process and establish the logistics concept of support planning baselining effort. Conduct a three-day seminar to assess Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (ISR) missions and focusing on military intelligence professionalization.

title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Chad - Defense Management Initiative and Logistics #6. Conduct a 2-day logistics planning symposium establishing two joint groups assigned different operational scenarios. Bring together multi-service sustainment and operational leaders to learn a five-step planning process and establish the logistics concept of support planning baseline effort. Conduct an EMAA operational policy, plan, and strategy review with the Chief of Staff and other key staff. Conduct formal meeting with the SATG Commanding General to fully discuss logistics planning workshops designed to train and shape SATG operational requirements driving sustainment practices.

title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - SATG Counterterrorism Company and Battalion Headquarters

description.narrative: This program will help build the capacity of Chad's Special Anti-Terrorism Group (SATG) to combat Boko Haram by creating a fully trained and equipped CT company with a headquarters element in the Lake Chad region.
